__e: Mom,I know this has all beenreally hard on you, but I just need youto trust me,okay?
You know what you have to do.
I have to talk to you about something important,.. ..but it's not about me, or me and you,.. ..don't worry, trust me.
MITCHELL: I think the name of the game is trust no one.
I mean it couldn't possibly be your fault that you don't trust anybody enough to actually be your friend.
That is why, if you want to thrive, you should never trust anyone!
You know what you have to do.
I have to talk to you about something important,.. ..but it's not about me, or me and you,.. ..don't worry, trust me.
Yes, but ... is not not trust you, it's just that ...
How can you honestly ask me to trust him after what he did?
I'll finalize the adoption immediately. - Thank you.
If you love her, trust her and trust me.
Like I told you before, she's the best.
Don't trust her, Jack, she's a part of all this.
And don't trust your cops neither, all right?
Not that I don't trust your mother.
What's best for us, Mom, is for you to trust us!
Trust me. Trust your own son, who's never asked you for a damn thing.
Or she just didn't trust your taste level. Oh.
And its not that i don't trust your judgment.
You will know what to do.
He wants you to trust what you know.
Do what you say and trust a man right until the end.
Trust your staff. That's what they're for.
It doesn't want to accept the truth, but trust your own eyes, everything you've seen today.
It's not that I don't trust the guys.
